about_the_game:
The darkest matrix ever created


My Dear Neighbor, edition 404 is a survival horror puzzle game set in a distinct and captivating world. Players will find themselves immersed in a story rich with unique characters and a terrifying atmosphere. This game challenges players with moral decisions and reveals a brutally unforgiving world waiting to be discovered. As players navigate through this virtual realm, they will experience a hand-crafted universe filled with secrets and parallel dimensions to explore and unravel.

In My Dear Neighbor, Edition 404, players are plunged into a bleak and terrifying universe, where they must seek answers within a matrix-like reality. The challenge lies in discerning truth from illusion and facing one's deepest fears. Players must fight to escape a nightmarish world riddled with bugs and harrowing visions in this intense psychological horror experience.

A world unique in its kind



My Dear Neighbor, Edition 404 transcends conventional visuals with its groundbreaking shaders that render objects distorted and seemingly unstable, imbuing the world with vibrant, vivid colors. This artistic choice gives the environment a hauntingly "unfinished" or "glitched" appearance, perfectly complementing the game's theme of a digital reality breaking down. It's a visual style that not only sets the game apart but also deepens the player's immersion in a world where the fabric of virtual existence is constantly in question

KEY FEATURES


- An Original Story : Inspired by "The Matrix" and "Code Lyoko", explore a unique world with diverse, meticulously designed environments.

- Intense Combat : Fight your way through this world. As a player, you'll be equipped with weapons to defend yourself in challenging battles against unique characters and boss fights.

- Impactful Choices : Make decisions that influence your gameplay experience and the game's ending.

- A Narrative-Driven Horror : Immerse yourself in a terrifying game rich in plot twists and featuring a variety of characters.

- A Unique Artistic Direction: Every element is meticulously crafted to embody the essence of a digital realm, enhancing the game's immersive quality. The visual design leverages the theme of a virtual world, drawing players deeper into its unique, glitched reality.

content_descriptors.notes: This game may contain content not appropriate for all ages : Frequent Violence or Gore, General Mature Content

name: My Dear Neighbor, edition 404

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2300 | AMD FX-4350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2GB VRAM GeForce GTX 1030, AMD RX 550
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4,69 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400 | AMD Ryzen 5 2600X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 8GB VRAM GeForce RTX 2080, AMD Radeon VII
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 4,69 GB available space

short_description: My Dear Neighbor, edition 404 is a survival horror game that tells the story of your neighbor. Go to your neighbor's house and end up in a glitchy nightmare. Fight your way out of this glitched nightmare amid bugs and nightmarish visions in this psychological horror game.
